Summary: four or five objects in diamond shape broke up into wandering parts
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Lodi
There were no other sightings in Lodi on or around November 22nd 2007
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were just leaving my parents house after thanksgiving dinner. i looked towards the east and first noticed a star-like light moving from north to south. after only a couple of seconds, i noticed four or five objects just under the southward moving light. they appeared to be approximately 1\8" in size at arm's length moving rapidly from south to north at about 30 degrees up above the horizon. they appeared to be partially illuminated (either self illuminated or lit from the ground). after moving together in a locked formation for around two seconds, they moved independently similar to a flock of birds. they seemed to glow a little bit like embers and faded away. i was excited at first because i thought that it was a ufo. i then thought they must be birds after they started to move independently. my wife thought they weren't birds because she said that birds sleep at night. upon reflection, i think they may not have been birds but then again they may have been.
